## GAD-7 vs FNS

GAD-7 (Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment) and FNS (Food Neophobia Scale) are essential instruments used by psychologists to understand an individual's psychological state and eating behaviours. It is an imperative task for psychologists to make a comparative analysis of these two scales. This is where Harmony comes in. Harmony, an advanced tool, consumes large language models to comprehensively compare items in these questionnaires and provide a percentage match. This makes the comparative task, GAD-7 vs FNS, more effective and absolutely efficient. The GAD-7, a 7-item instrument, measures the severity of generalised anxiety disorder, asking the individual to rate the severity of his or her symptoms over the past two weeks. The FNS comprises questions relating to a child's Trust and apprehension toward new foods. Using the Harmony tool, psychologists and researchers can streamline the process of harmonising these items, even in different languages. To make the most out of the GAD-7 vs FNS comparison, professionals need to simply upload or select the instruments from Harmony's database via their user-friendly web interface at https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app. In conclusion, Harmony provides unprecedented assistance in the comparative study between GAD-7 vs FNS, eliminating the shortcomings of traditional harmonisation and providing accurate cross-study comparisons. It efficiently cuts down on time consumption, provides a multilingual platform, and lessens the subjective differences in the comparison of GAD-7 vs FNS. It is an undeniable boon to psychologists and researchers making life easier in longitudinal and cohort studies.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and FNS

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and FNS into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just FNS into Harmony</a> - compare FNS with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
